description.title: Service Description
description.content: PanPlans is a meal planning application that helps users plan meals, manage pantry inventory, create shopping lists, and track nutritional information. The app provides suggestions and recommendations based on user preferences and dietary requirements.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: To use certain features of PanPlans, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
All activities that occur under your account
Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
items: Use the app for any unlawful purpose
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Interfere with or disrupt the app's functionality
Use the app to spam or harass others

healthDisclaimer.title: Health and Nutrition Disclaimer
healthDisclaimer.content: Important: PanPlans provides nutritional information and meal suggestions for informational purposes only.
items: We are not medical professionals and do not provide medical advice
Nutritional information may not be 100% accurate
Always consult with a healthcare provider for dietary advice
If you have food allergies or medical conditions, verify all ingredients independently

allergenDisclaimer.title: Allergen Disclaimer
allergenDisclaimer.content: While PanPlans allows you to set dietary restrictions and allergies, we cannot guarantee that all recipes or suggestions will be free from your specified allergens. You should:
items: Always verify ingredients before preparing or consuming any food
Not rely solely on PanPlans for allergen information
Consult product labels and manufacturers when in doubt
